# Configuración: JPFW01 (PfSense)

Este es el **firewall de borde** y el **gateway a Internet** de la red. Se encarga de la seguridad y del **NAT** (Traducción de Direcciones de Red).

```bash
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<pfsense>
	<version>23.3</version>
	<lastchange/>
	<system>
		<optimization>normal</optimization>
		<hostname>JPFW01</hostname>
		<domain>home.arpa</domain>
		<group>
			<name>all</name>
			<description>All Users</description>
			<scope>system</scope>
			<gid>1998</gid>
			<member>0</member>
		</group>
		<group>
			<name>admins</name>
			<description>System Administrators</description>
			<scope>system</scope>
			<gid>1999</gid>
			<member>0</member>
			<priv>page-all</priv>
		</group>
		<user>
			<name>admin</name>
			<descr>System Administrator</descr>
			<scope>system</scope>
			<groupname>admins</groupname>
			<uid>0</uid>
			<priv>user-shell-access</priv>
			<bcrypt-hash>
$2y$10$8Ue6lNuNDjnmbS7vKiwXeO64Trs4cblZpb1oZR81f.xVhYEY3Uoqm
			</bcrypt-hash>
		</user>
		<nextuid>2000</nextuid>
		<nextgid>2000</nextgid>
		<timeservers>2.pfsense.pool.ntp.org</timeservers>
		<webgui>
			<protocol>http</protocol>
			<loginautocomplete/>
			<ssl-certref>68b4b9b15bd98</ssl-certref>
			<althostnames/>
			<dashboardcolumns>2</dashboardcolumns>
			<webguicss>pfSense.css</webguicss>
			<logincss>1e3f75;</logincss>
		</webgui>
		<disablenatreflection>yes</disablenatreflection>
		<disablesegmentationoffloading/>
		<disablelargereceiveoffloading/>
		<ipv6allow/>
		<maximumtableentries>400000</maximumtableentries>
		<powerd_ac_mode>hadp</powerd_ac_mode>
		<powerd_battery_mode>hadp</powerd_battery_mode>
		<powerd_normal_mode>hadp</powerd_normal_mode>
		<bogons>
			<interval>monthly</interval>
		</bogons>
		<hn_altq_enable/>
		<already_run_config_upgrade/>
		<ssh>
			<enable>enabled</enable>
		</ssh>
		<timezone>America/Montevideo</timezone>
		<language>en_US</language>
		<dnsserver>8.8.8.8</dnsserver>
		<dnsserver>1.1.1.1</dnsserver>
		<dnsallowoverride/>
		<dns1gw>none</dns1gw>
		<dns2gw>none</dns2gw>
	</system>
	<interfaces>
		<wan>
			<enable/>
			<if>em0</if>
			<blockpriv/>
			<blockbogons/>
			<descr>WAN</descr>
			<ipaddr>dhcp</ipaddr>
			<dhcphostname/>
			<alias-address/>
			<alias-subnet>32</alias-subnet>
			<dhcprejectfrom/>
			<adv_dhcp_pt_timeout/>
			<adv_dhcp_pt_retry/>
			<adv_dhcp_pt_select_timeout/>
			<adv_dhcp_pt_reboot/>
			<adv_dhcp_pt_backoff_cutoff/>
			<adv_dhcp_pt_initial_interval/>
			<adv_dhcp_pt_values>SavedCfg</adv_dhcp_pt_values>
			<adv_dhcp_send_options/>
			<adv_dhcp_request_options/>
			<adv_dhcp_required_options/>
			<adv_dhcp_option_modifiers/>
			<adv_dhcp_config_advanced/>
			<adv_dhcp_config_file_override/>
			<adv_dhcp_config_file_override_path/>
			<ipaddrv6>dhcp6</ipaddrv6>
			<dhcp6-duid/>
			<dhcp6-ia-pd-len>0</dhcp6-ia-pd-len>
			<adv_dhcp6_prefix_selected_interface>wan</adv_dhcp6_prefix_selected_interface>
			<spoofmac/>
		</wan>
		<lan>
			<enable/>
			<if>em1</if>
			<ipaddr>192.168.1.1</ipaddr>
			<subnet>24</subnet>
			<ipaddrv6/>
			<subnetv6/>
			<media/>
			<mediaopt/>
			<track6-interface>wan</track6-interface>
			<track6-prefix-id>0</track6-prefix-id>
			<gateway/>
			<gatewayv6/>
		</lan>
		<opt1>
			<descr>REDINTERNA</descr>
			<if>em2</if>
			<spoofmac/>
			<enable/>
			<ipaddr>10.10.0.1</ipaddr>
			<subnet>30</subnet>
		</opt1>
	</interfaces>
	<staticroutes>
		<route>
			<network>172.16.5.0/24</network>
			<gateway>HACIA_RED_INTERNA</gateway>
			<descr>HACIA RED VLAN 5</descr>
		</route>
		<route>
			<network>172.16.10.0/24</network>
			<gateway>HACIA_RED_INTERNA</gateway>
			<descr>HACIA RED VLAN 10</descr>
		</route>
		<route>
			<network>172.16.200.0/24</network>
			<gateway>HACIA_RED_INTERNA</gateway>
			<descr>HACIA RED VLAN 200</descr>
		</route>
	</staticroutes>
	<dhcpd>
		<lan>
			<range>
				<from>192.168.1.10</from>
				<to>192.168.1.245</to>
			</range>
		</lan>
	</dhcpd>
	<dhcpdv6>
		<lan>
			<range>
				<from>::1000</from>
				<to>::2000</to>
			</range>
			<ramode>disabled</ramode>
			<rapriority>medium</rapriority>
		</lan>
	</dhcpdv6>
	<snmpd>
		<syslocation/>
		<syscontact/>
		<rocommunity>public</rocommunity>
	</snmpd>
	<diag>
		<ipv6nat>
			<ipaddr/>
		</ipv6nat>
	</diag>
	<syslog>
		<filterdescriptions>1</filterdescriptions>
	</syslog>
	<nat>
		<outbound>
			<mode>hybrid</mode>
			<rule>
				<source>
					<network>10.10.0.0/30</network>
				</source>
				<sourceport/>
				<descr/>
				<target>wanip</target>
				<target_subnet/>
				<interface>wan</interface>
				<poolopts/>
				<source_hash_key/>
				<ipprotocol>inet</ipprotocol>
				<destination>
					<any/>
				</destination>
				<created>
					<time>1756750749</time>
					<username>admin@192.168.1.50 (Local Database)</username>
				</created>
				<updated>
					<time>1756750795</time>
					<username>admin@192.168.1.50 (Local Database)</username>
				</updated>
			</rule>
		</outbound>
		<separator/>
	</nat>
	<filter>
		<rule>
			<id/>
			<tracker>1762624009</tracker>
			<type>pass</type>
			<interface>wan</interface>
			<ipprotocol>inet</ipprotocol>
			<tag/>
			<tagged/>
			<max/>
			<max-src-nodes/>
			<max-src-conn/>
			<max-src-states/>
			<statetimeout/>
			<statetype>keep state</statetype>
			<os/>
			<protocol>udp</protocol>
			<source>
				<any/>
			</source>
			<destination>
				<network>wanip</network>
				<port>41641</port>
			</destination>
			<descr>Permitir Tailscale</descr>
			<created>
				<time>1762624009</time>
				<username>admin@192.168.1.50 (Local Database)</username>
			</created>
			<updated>
				<time>1762624248</time>
				<username>admin@192.168.1.50 (Local Database)</username>
			</updated>
		</rule>
		<rule>
			<type>pass</type>
			<ipprotocol>inet</ipprotocol>
			<descr>Default allow LAN to any rule</descr>
			<interface>lan</interface>
			<tracker>0100000101</tracker>
			<source>
				<network>lan</network>
			</source>
			<destination>
				<any/>
			</destination>
		</rule>
		<rule>
			<type>pass</type>
			<ipprotocol>inet6</ipprotocol>
			<descr>Default allow LAN IPv6 to any rule</descr>
			<interface>lan</interface>
			<tracker>0100000102</tracker>
			<source>
				<network>lan</network>
			</source>
			<destination>
				<any/>
			</destination>
		</rule>
		<rule>
			<id/>
			<tracker>1762571690</tracker>
			<type>pass</type>
			<interface>Tailscale</interface>
			<ipprotocol>inet</ipprotocol>
			<tag/>
			<tagged/>
			<max/>
			<max-src-nodes/>
			<max-src-conn/>
			<max-src-states/>
			<statetimeout/>
			<statetype>keep state</statetype>
			<os/>
			<protocol>tcp</protocol>
			<source>
				<any/>
			</source>
			<destination>
				<any/>
			</destination>
			<descr/>
			<created>
				<time>1762571690</time>
				<username>admin@192.168.1.50 (Local Database)</username>
			</created>
			<updated>
				<time>1762571806</time>
				<username>admin@192.168.1.50 (Local Database)</username>
			</updated>
		</rule>
		<rule>
			<id/>
			<tracker>1762619052</tracker>
			<type>pass</type>
			<interface>opt1</interface>
			<ipprotocol>inet</ipprotocol>
			<tag/>
			<tagged/>
			<max/>
			<max-src-nodes/>
			<max-src-conn/>
			<max-src-states/>
			<statetimeout/>
			<statetype>keep state</statetype>
			<os/>
			<protocol>tcp</protocol>
			<source>
				<any/>
			</source>
			<destination>
				<any/>
				<port>22</port>
			</destination>
			<descr/>
			<updated>
				<time>1762619052</time>
				<username>admin@192.168.1.50 (Local Database)</username>
			</updated>
			<created>
				<time>1762619052</time>
				<username>admin@192.168.1.50 (Local Database)</username>
			</created>
		</rule>
		<rule>
			<id/>
			<tracker>1756749792</tracker>
			<type>pass</type>
			<interface>opt1</interface>
			<ipprotocol>inet</ipprotocol>
			<tag/>
			<tagged/>
			<max/>
			<max-src-nodes/>
			<max-src-conn/>
			<max-src-states/>
			<statetimeout/>
			<statetype>keep state</statetype>
			<os/>
			<source>
				<any/>
			</source>
			<destination>
				<any/>
			</destination>
			<descr/>
			<created>
				<time>1756749792</time>
				<username>admin@192.168.1.50 (Local Database)</username>
			</created>
			<updated>
				<time>1756750298</time>
				<username>admin@192.168.1.50 (Local Database)</username>
			</updated>
		</rule>
		<separator>
			<opt1/>
			<wan/>
			<tailscale/>
		</separator>
	</filter>
	<shaper> </shaper>
	<ipsec>
		<client/>
	</ipsec>
	<aliases/>
	<proxyarp/>
	<cron>
		<item>
			<minute>*/1</minute>
			<hour>*</hour>
			<mday>*</mday>
			<month>*</month>
			<wday>*</wday>
			<who>root</who>
			<command>/usr/sbin/newsyslog</command>
		</item>
		<item>
			<minute>1</minute>
			<hour>3</hour>
			<mday>*</mday>
			<month>*</month>
			<wday>*</wday>
			<who>root</who>
			<command>/etc/rc.periodic daily</command>
		</item>
		<item>
			<minute>15</minute>
			<hour>4</hour>
			<mday>*</mday>
			<month>*</month>
			<wday>6</wday>
			<who>root</who>
			<command>/etc/rc.periodic weekly</command>
		</item>
		<item>
			<minute>30</minute>
			<hour>5</hour>
			<mday>1</mday>
			<month>*</month>
			<wday>*</wday>
			<who>root</who>
			<command>/etc/rc.periodic monthly</command>
		</item>
		<item>
			<minute>1,31</minute>
			<hour>0-5</hour>
			<mday>*</mday>
			<month>*</month>
			<wday>*</wday>
			<who>root</who>
			<command>/usr/bin/nice -n20 adjkerntz -a</command>
		</item>
		<item>
			<minute>1</minute>
			<hour>3</hour>
			<mday>1</mday>
			<month>*</month>
			<wday>*</wday>
			<who>root</who>
			<command>/usr/bin/nice -n20 /etc/rc.update_bogons.sh</command>
		</item>
		<item>
			<minute>1</minute>
			<hour>1</hour>
			<mday>*</mday>
			<month>*</month>
			<wday>*</wday>
			<who>root</who>
			<command>/usr/bin/nice -n20 /etc/rc.dyndns.update</command>
		</item>
		<item>
			<minute>*/60</minute>
			<hour>*</hour>
			<mday>*</mday>
			<month>*</month>
			<wday>*</wday>
			<who>root</who>
			<command>
/usr/bin/nice -n20 /usr/local/sbin/expiretable -v -t 3600 virusprot
			</command>
		</item>
		<item>
			<minute>30</minute>
			<hour>12</hour>
			<mday>*</mday>
			<month>*</month>
			<wday>*</wday>
			<who>root</who>
			<command>/usr/bin/nice -n20 /etc/rc.update_urltables</command>
		</item>
		<item>
			<minute>1</minute>
			<hour>0</hour>
			<mday>*</mday>
			<month>*</month>
			<wday>*</wday>
			<who>root</who>
			<command>/usr/bin/nice -n20 /etc/rc.update_pkg_metadata</command>
		</item>
	</cron>
	<wol/>
	<rrd>
		<enable/>
	</rrd>
	<widgets>
		<sequence>
system_information:col1:show,disks:col1:show,netgate_services_and_support:col2:show,interfaces:col2:show
		</sequence>
		<period>10</period>
	</widgets>
	<openvpn/>
	<dnshaper> </dnshaper>
	<unbound>
		<enable/>
		<dnssec/>
		<active_interface/>
		<outgoing_interface/>
		<custom_options/>
		<hideidentity/>
		<hideversion/>
		<dnssecstripped/>
	</unbound>
	<vlans/>
	<qinqs/>
	<revision>
		<time>1762624248</time>
		<description>
admin@192.168.1.50 (Local Database): Firewall: Rules - saved/edited a firewall rule.
		</description>
		<username>admin@192.168.1.50 (Local Database)</username>
	</revision>
	<gateways>
		<gateway_item>
			<interface>opt1</interface>
			<gateway>10.10.0.2</gateway>
			<name>HACIA_RED_INTERNA</name>
			<weight>1</weight>
			<ipprotocol>inet</ipprotocol>
			<descr/>
			<gw_down_kill_states/>
		</gateway_item>
		<defaultgw4/>
		<defaultgw6/>
	</gateways>
	<captiveportal/>
	<dnsmasq/>
	<ntpd>
		<gps/>
	</ntpd>
	<cert>
		<refid>68b4b9b15bd98</refid>
		<descr>GUI default (68b4b9b15bd98)</descr>
		<type>server</type>
		<crt>

		</crt>
		<prv>

		</prv>
	</cert>
	<ppps/>
	<installedpackages>
		<package>
			<name>Tailscale</name>
			<descr>
Tailscale is a mesh VPN alternative, based on WireGuard, that connects your computers, databases, and services together securely without any proxies.
			</descr>
			<pkginfolink>https://github.com/tailscale/tailscale</pkginfolink>
			<version>0.1.4</version>
			<configurationfile>tailscale.xml</configurationfile>
			<tabs>
				<tab>
					<text>Authentication</text>
					<url>pkg_edit.php?xml=tailscale/tailscale_auth.xml</url>
				</tab>
				<tab>
					<text>Settings</text>
					<url>pkg_edit.php?xml=tailscale.xml</url>
					<active/>
				</tab>
				<tab>
					<text>Status</text>
					<url>status_tailscale.php</url>
				</tab>
			</tabs>
			<include_file>/usr/local/pkg/tailscale/tailscale.inc</include_file>
		</package>
		<menu>
			<name>Tailscale</name>
			<section>VPN</section>
			<configfile>tailscale.xml</configfile>
			<url>/pkg_edit.php?xml=tailscale.xml</url>
		</menu>
		<menu>
			<name>Tailscale </name>
			<section>Status</section>
			<configfile>tailscale.xml</configfile>
			<url>/status_tailscale.php</url>
		</menu>
		<service>
			<name>tailscale</name>
			<rcfile>pfsense_tailscaled</rcfile>
			<executable>tailscaled</executable>
			<description>Tailscale Daemon</description>
		</service>
		<tailscale>
			<config>
				<enable>on</enable>
				<listenport>41641</listenport>
				<statedir>/usr/local/pkg/tailscale/state</statedir>
				<keepconfig>on</keepconfig>
				<acceptdns>on</acceptdns>
				<exitnode/>
				<acceptroutes/>
				<row>
					<advertisedroutevalue/>
					<advertisedroutedescr/>
				</row>
				<syslogenable/>
				<syslogpriority>notice</syslogpriority>
				<syslogfacility>daemon</syslogfacility>
			</config>
		</tailscale>
	</installedpackages>
	<ifgroups>
		<ifgroupentry>
			<ifname>Tailscale</ifname>
			<descr>Tailscale Interface Group (DO NOT EDIT/DELETE!)</descr>
			<members/>
		</ifgroupentry>
	</ifgroups>
	<sshdata>
		<sshkeyfile>
			<filename>ssh_host_rsa_key</filename>
			<xmldata>

			</xmldata>
		</sshkeyfile>
		<sshkeyfile>

			<xmldata>

		</sshkeyfile>
	</sshdata>
</pfsense>
```
